Short.title: Stroke pyramid
Short.description: Stroke pyramid: 10/20/30/40/50/40/30/20/10 Take 10 strokes hard followed by 10 light. Then take 20 strokes hard followed by 20 light. 30 hard, 30 light. 40-40. 50-50. 40-40. 30-30. 20-20. 10-10 (hard @2k, easy paddle)

Short.title: 2 x 2000m rate increase
Short.description: 2 x 2000m rate increase / 4 min easy @2k + 8-10 (can go less at higher spm). Row two 2000 meter pieces. In each piece, row the first 1000 meters @ 26 spm. Then 500 meters @ 28 spm, 250 meters @ 30 spm and 250 meters @ 32 spm. Row for four minutes at light pressure during the rest period.

Short.title: 21 minutes with rate increase
Short.description: 21 minutes with rate increase @ 2k + 18-20 (decreasing time by 2 sec every rate increase) Row the first six minutes @ 20 spm. Then row five minutes @ 22 spm, four @ 24, three @ 26, two @ 28 and one @ 30.

Short.title: 6x500m / 2' rest
Short.description: 6x500m / 2' rest @ 2k - 1-3. Every time you do this remove 15” rest (like separate days)

Short.title: 13 x 30” flat out
Short.description: 13 x 30” flat out with 15” rest (so 6:30 total work) - up to 3 sets with 4' rest between them

Short.title: Ergocalypse
Short.description: Ergocalypse [14 x 250m @ 2k - 3-4 with 1' rest. Open Rate.]

Medium.title: 2x 19' pyramids/ 3' rest
Medium.description:
2x 19' pyramids/ 3' rest:
[4' @18sr, 3' @20sr, 2' @22sr, 1' @24sr, 2'@22sr, 3'@20sr, 4'@18sr] x 2
3' rest. Keep a consistent split between pieces

Medium.title: 10,000m with rate changes
Medium.description:
10,000m with rate changes every 2000m:
24-22-24-26-24 @2K + 15-25

Medium.title: 8 x 500m / 2 min rest
Medium.description:
8 x 500m / 2 min rest @2k +1-2:
Perform eight 500m pieces with a 2-minute rest period between each piece.

Medium.title: 4 x 2000m / 2 min rest
Medium.description:
4 x 2000m / 2 min rest @2k+5-10:
Perform four 2000m pieces with a 2-minute rest period between each piece.

Medium.title: 5 x 1500m / 1' paddle
Medium.description:
5 x 1500m / 1' paddle @2k + 12-16:
Perform five 1500m pieces with a 1-minute paddle between each piece.

Medium.title: 2 x 12 min / 6' easy
Medium.description:
2 x 12 min / 6' easy @2k + 10:
Perform two 12-minute pieces with a 6-minute easy row between each piece.

Medium.title: 6 x 3 min / 3' easy
Medium.description:
6 x 3 min / 3' easy @2k + 2:
Perform six 3-minute pieces with a 3-minute easy row between each piece.

Medium.title: 10000m @16-22spm
Medium.description:
10000m @16-22spm:
Row a 10,000m piece at a stroke rate between 16 and 22 spm.

Medium.title: 30' Time Trial
Medium.description:
30' Time Trial:
Row as far as you can in 30 minutes.

Medium.title: 5 x 5 min / 2 min easy
Medium.description:
5 x 5 min / 2 min easy @2k + 6-12:
Perform five 5-minute pieces with a 2-minute easy row between each piece.

Medium.title: 40' @ 2k + 20-30
Medium.description:
40' @ 2k + 20-30:
Row for 40 minutes at a pace 20-30 seconds slower than your 2k pace.

Medium.title: Erg Assault
Medium.description:
Erg Assault [6 x 1000m / 3 min' @ 2k + 4-5. Open Rate]:
Perform six 1000m pieces with a 3-minute rest between each piece.

Medium.title: 2 x 20', 1' rest
Medium.description:
2 x 20', 1' rest. @2k + 20-30:
Perform two 20-minute pieces with a 1-minute rest between each piece.

Medium.title: 6000 m, harder strokes
Medium.description:
6000 m, taking 10 harder strokes at the beginning of each 500 m:
Row a 6000m piece with an increased intensity for the first 10 strokes of each 500m.

Medium.title: 2x 15' pyramid, 2' rest
Medium.description:
2x 15' pyramid, 2' rest:
Perform two 15-minute pyramid pieces with a 2-minute rest between each piece.

Medium.title: Quadzilla
Medium.description:
Quadzilla [4x4', 3' rest @2k + 0-4. Open Rate]:
Perform four 4-minute pieces with a 3-minute rest between each piece.

Medium.title: 20 x 1:40 on, 20" off
Medium.description:
20 x 1:40 on (sr > 30), 20" off (paddle):
Perform 20 intervals of 1:40 at a stroke rate greater than 30 with a 20-second paddle between intervals.

Medium.title: 7 X [3 min @ 22 spm, 2 min @ 25, 1 min @ 28], 2' rest
Medium.description:
7 X [3 min @ 22 spm, 2 min @ 25, 1 min @ 28], 2' rest between sets:
Perform seven intervals of 3 minutes at 22 spm, 2 minutes at 25 spm, and 1 minute at 28 spm, with a 2-minute rest between each set.

Medium.title: Speed/endurance intervals
Medium.description:
Row 6 sets of 3min on/1 min off/ 90s on/ 30s off:
The 3 min intervals @24-26sr, the 90s intervals @ 26-30sr.

Medium.title: (20 bullet) 20x 1' on, 1' rest
Medium.description:
(20 bullet) 20x 1' on, 1' rest. @2K - 0-2:
Perform twenty 1-minute intervals with a 1-minute rest between each interval.

Medium.title: Death on a Stick
Medium.description:
Death on a Stick [5x5'. SR 22, 24, 26, Open, 26 ALL OUT. 5' rest after each one. @2k + 4-6]:
Perform five 5-minute pieces with a 5-minute rest between each piece. Stroke rates: 22, 24, 26, Open, 26 ALL OUT.

Long.title: 2 x 25' @ 2k + 10-16, 2' rest
Long.description:
Piece 1: Row for 25 minutes @2k + 10-16, with a 20-22 stroke rate.
Piece 2: Row the same distance as piece 1, with a goal to complete it in under 25 minutes.

Long.title: 3 x 20' @ 2k + 10-16, 2' rest
Long.description:
Piece 1: Row for 20 minutes @2k + 10-16, with a 20-22 stroke rate.
Piece 2: Row the same distance as piece 1, with a goal to complete it in under 20 minutes.
Piece 3: Row the same distance as piece 1, with a goal to complete it in under 20 minutes.

Long.title: 4-6-8-10-8-6-4 min pyramid / 2' rest @2k + 15-20
Long.description: Row a pyramid: 4 minutes on, 2 minutes rest, 6 minutes on, 2 minutes rest, 8 minutes on, 2 minutes rest, 10 minutes on, 2 minutes rest, 8 minutes on, 2 minutes rest, 6 minutes on, 2 minutes rest, 4 minutes on. @2k + 15-20

Long.title: 2x 30', 2' rest @ 2k + 20-30
Long.description: Row two 30-minute pieces with a 2-minute rest between each piece @2k + 20-30

Long.title: 3 x 5000m / 2' rest @2k + 15-25
Long.description: Row three 5,000m pieces with a 2-minute rest between each piece @2k + 15-25

Long.title: 5 x 12' / 3' easy/rest as needed @2k+15-25
Long.description: Row five 12-minute pieces with a 3-minute easy row or rest between each piece @2k + 15-25

Long.title: 5K on, 5' paddle. 4K on, 4' paddle. 3K on, 3' off. 2K on, 2' paddle. 1K on, 1' paddle. On@2K + 10-20
Long.description: Row a 5K piece, then a 5-minute paddle, a 4K piece, then a 4-minute paddle, a 3K piece, then a 3-minute rest, a 2K piece, then a 2-minute paddle, and a 1K piece, then a 1-minute paddle. On@2K + 10-20

Long.title: 2 x 10,000m / 3' rest @2k + 20-30
Long.description: Row two 10,000m pieces with a 3-minute rest between each piece @2k + 20-30

Long.title: 4 x 5000m / 2' rest @2k + 20-30
Long.description: Row four 5,000m pieces with a 2-minute rest between each piece @2k + 20-30
